Detailed Description

Handles discovery, registration and utilization of plugins.

Member Function Documentation

TemplatePlugins::load ( TemplateCompilerEx $  compiler,
$  node,
$  plugin,
$  pluginFile = null,
$  noThrow = false 
)

Load single plugin.

Parameters:
[in] $compiler TemplateCompilerEx instance
[in] $node Optional TemplateNodeEx instance
[in] $plugin Plugin name
[in] $pluginFile Plugin's full filename (optional)
[in] $noThrow If true, no exception will be thrown on error (boolean false will be returned)
Return values:
true Plugin has been loaded
false Plugin is invalid/non-existant
